text:
Uncensored version: he cracks the Realian's arm and then throws the corpse away. Scares MOMO with a knife and then cuts his arm and head with it. Head is seen talking in the ground.
Censored version: he drops the Realian's arm and you can't see when he gets rid of the corpse. He then scares MOMO by getting close to her and somehow cuts his arm, then proceeds to tear his head appart from his body with his bare hands. Head is seen talking in the ground next to the body. 
Which is creepier?

author: Haleigh Freier

text: Perhaps the greatest videogame villian of all time. In episode I we are treated to (by any RPG standards) one truly sick bastard with scene after scene of horrifying insanity. In the second game we gain first perspective insight of Albedo the innocent and naive child, learning the torment of what it means to live forever. After a good 5 or 6 years of playing I still believe that Albedo and Rubedo are two of the most fleshed out characters in RPG history. Sooooo much character development.

text: Personally, I think that Ep. I had the best music out of the entire Xenosaga series. Yasunori Mitsuda did a bunch of great pieces that I think Yuji Kajiura fell a little short of. I think "Last Battle" was the best song of the series...and in the following episodes, "Sweet Song" was the only thing that stuck in my head from Ep. II, and Ep. III didn't have any defining songs for me. Maybe it's because the London Philharmonic Orchestra played for Ep. I that I found it so likable ^_^...

text: I think Albedo might be one of Crispen Freeman's greatest roles.  He's such a badass and now he's an -insane- badass.  There are so very few songs that could do the job of accurately capturing this incredible madman, but as to be expected of Xenosaga's soundtrack, it does it stellarly.
author: Garlyle Wilds

text:
If I remember correctly the developers almost had to cut that scene from the game because of how bad it was, the managed to keep it in though they just had to edit some things.

Still, that scene was like something out of a stephen king novel, very disturbing scene.
author: DarkSeraphim02
